title: How to Watch Movies in Theaters At Home

steps.title: Visit https://www.vudu.com/ and create an account.
steps.content: Visit https://www.vudu.com/ and create an account. Vudu is an online rental and streaming service that offers access to thousands of movies and TV shows. Not all movies on Vudu are currently in theaters, but a select few are. Note that Vudu is the new home of AMC On Demand, the former rental service from the largest theatrical chain.

steps.title: Rent movies from the "Fandango At Home" section.
steps.content: Rent movies from the "Fandango At Home" section. It is likely the first section listed atop Vudu's homepage. Vudu has partnered with Fandango to make movies currently in theaters available for rent or purchase. Note that you may not be saving money by purchasing a theatrical release at home. The cost is often equivalent to two movie tickets.

steps.title: Visit https://www.redbox.com/ondemand-movies/featured.
steps.content: Visit https://www.redbox.com/ondemand-movies/featured . You may be familiar with the Redbox rental kiosks in your local grocery or convenience store, but did you know Redbox also offers an online rental service? Redbox On Demand allows anyone to rent newer and older films online. Redbox On Demand is a bit more expensive than renting discs from the kiosk, but there are usually a few On Demand Exclusives that are still in theaters.

steps.title: Browse your favorite streaming services for new releases.
steps.content: Browse your favorite streaming services for new releases. In recent years, services like Netflix and Amazon Prime Video have adopted a day-and-date release model, which means that a new film is released in theaters and on streaming simultaneously. Check out your favorite streaming service and see if any recently added movies are also in theaters as well. Even if a film is not released day-and-date, it may end up on streaming towards the end of its theatrical window. Apple TV+ tends to release their films in this way, for example.

steps.title: Visit https://thepiratebay.org/top.php.
steps.content: Visit https://thepiratebay.org/top.php . There are several popular torrenting sites, but The Pirate Bay is likely the most popular. Torrenting is illegal and can corrupt your computer with malware, but this wikiHow guide can help you torrent theatrical releases safely and securely. Other popular torrenting sites include 1337x and TorrentGalaxy. When browsing theatrical releases on torrenting sites, you may come across several cam rips. These are low-quality videos in which another person has recorded the movie from the theater. Cam rips may be sufficient viewing for some, but try to look for web rips instead.

steps.title: Google the film that you want to watch online.
steps.content: Google the film that you want to watch online. Use the film's name and the phrase "stream online free". If the film is available illegally, your search will yield a few results. Not every site is reliable when streaming video illegally, but you may come across a site that has the film you are looking for! Never download any videos from an illegal streaming site. Follow this wikiHow guide for safe practices. When browsing theatrical releases on third-party streaming sites, you may come across several cam rips. These are low-quality videos in which another person has recorded the movie from the theater. Cam rips may be sufficient viewing for some, but try to look for web rips instead.

steps.title: Visit Amazon Video.
steps.content: Visit Amazon Video . Amazon Video (not to be confused with Amazon Prime Video) allows you to rent or buy countless films or TV shows. Some new releases may be available on Amazon Video. Pay particular attention to the Home Premiere movies section.

steps.title: Visit https://tv.apple.com/.
steps.content: Visit https://tv.apple.com/ . Alternatively, you can use the Apple TV app on your iPhone or iPad. Even if you do not have an Apple TV+ subscription, you can use Apple TV to rent countless movies and TV shows. A select few films available for rent/purchase may still be in theaters.

steps.title: Open the Google TV app on your Android device.
steps.content: Open the Google TV app on your Android device. The Google TV app allows you to rent or purchase countless films and TV shows. Some of these films may still be in theaters.
